content.question: ​The graph of point <math alttext="P"><semantics><mi>P</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is given in the <math alttext="x y"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>-plane. Which of the following are possible polar coordinates of point <math alttext="P"><semantics><mi>P</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

choices.label: ​​<math alttext="open parentheses 2 comma pi over 4 close parentheses"><semantics><mfenced><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfenced><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​​<math alttext="open parentheses 2 comma fraction numerator 3 pi over denominator 4 end fraction close parentheses"><semantics><mfenced><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfenced><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​​<math alttext="open parentheses 2 square root of 2 comma pi over 4 close parentheses"><semantics><mfenced><mrow><mn>2</mn><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mi>π</mi><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfenced><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="open parentheses 2 square root of 2 comma fraction numerator 3 pi over denominator 4 end fraction close parentheses"><semantics><mfenced><mrow><mn>2</mn><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfenced><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="open parentheses 2 square root of 2 comma fraction numerator 3 pi over denominator 4 end fraction close parentheses"><semantics><mfenced><mrow><mn>2</mn><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>π</mi></mrow><mn>4</mn></mfrac></mrow></mfenced><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and verbal representations to answer a question or construct a model, with and without technology.
